descriptionHtml:
[CURRENTLY A WIP]

This Mod Overhauls many aspects of Skyrim, some of them listed here:
*Adds Artifacts from the Previous Games
*Rebuilds Winterhold
*Adds many new transport options
*Adds New Cities complete with Voice Acting
*Adds Tons of New Quests 
*Adds a Journal to chronicle your Quests
*Adds many new creatures
*Removes leveled lists and replaces with creatures that change depending on location (Save Often)
*removes many Quest rewards and replaces them with something better or worse, depending on the quest.
*Changes costs and materials for many items
*Overhaul the Perk System and Leveling
*And many More

Compatibility:
Won\'t work with a Lot of mods, any Mod authors are welcome to see if we can get a Compatibility fix working for your mod

CURRENT RELEASE: There is a working version of Twilight Assassins, which adds 10 assassins that are very strong to the game. The riddle to finding them is 

You will hunt Uvisea, who seeks to raise the ultimate necromancer. Tsabhira, seeking an alchemist\'s ultimate treasure. Ciene, who joined her vampiric kin in a lair of webs. Ardaru, who slays at a god\'s beacon, and Rithle, hunting a ghostly rider.

You shall kill Optiok and Shakh, who still the hearts of talking stones, Effe-Tee, who seek refuge in the chilled winds of a dragon\'s ascent. Escarna, who hides in a Madman\'s bloody mansion, and finally Ri\'Dato, who wishes to summon a dragon in the darkest reaches.
author: Ashfyr
